text: Joy is a 2018 Austrian drama movie directed by Sudabeh Mortezai and starring Joy Anwulika Alphonsus, Mariam Sanusi, Angela Ekeleme. The film made an entry from Austria for the Best International Feature Film at the 92nd Academy Awards event but was later removed from the nomination list because, according to Academy, it has mostly English dialougs. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2018 drama movies Category:Austrian drama movies
title: Joy (2018 movie)
